name: Deathlock Mastermind
resistance: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
senses: darkvision 120 ft. (including magical darkness), passive Perception 14
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The deathlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: detect magic, disguise self, mage armor

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The deathlock is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells: * Cantrips (at will): chill touch, mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray * 5th level (2 slots): arms of Hadar, blight, counterspell, crown of madness, darkness, dimension door, dispel magic, fly, hold monster, invisibility

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.
